Datasource.Name: Northwind
Datasource.Description: This datasource having the Northwind database connection information to use in Report and Dataset.

Datasource.Description: This datasource having the AdventureWorks database connection information to use in Report and Dataset.

Dataset.Name: Sales
Dataset.Description: This dataset having the query to get sales details from AdventureWorks DataSource.

Dataset.Name: InvoiceDetails
Dataset.Description: This dataset having the query to get invoice details from Northwind DataSource.

Dataset.Name: CustomerDetail
Dataset.Description: This dataset having the query to get customers information from AdventureWorks DataSource.

Dataset.Name: SharedDatasetQueryParameter
Dataset.Description: This dataset utilizes the shared dataset query parameter feature to filter sales order details from the AdventureWorks DataSource.

ReportPart.Name: ReportHeader
ReportPart.Description: This sample report part illustrates a report header design featuring the Report Title, Logo, and Order ID, utilizing basic report items like Textbox, Image, and Rectangle.

ReportPart.Name: ReportBody
ReportPart.Description: This sample report part illustrates a report body design featuring the Invoice Report utilizing Tablix data region, Report Parameters, SSRS Expressions and Barcode.

ReportPart.Name: ReportFooter
ReportPart.Description: This sample report part illustrates a report footer design featuring the Invoice Declaration utilizing basic report items like Textbox and Rectangle.
